title: neighborhoods_pdx
extent: Clackamas County, Multnomah County, and Washington County, Oregon

use_constraints: These data are distributed uner the terms of the City of Portland Data Distribution Policy.  To review the Data Distribution Agreement, please visit http://Portland Data Distribution Policy.
distribution_liability: The City of Portland has placed restrictions on the distribution of this data due to security concerns. format_name: Shapefile - Data will be provided via City of Portland FTP Site.
online_access_instructions: If the data is not available on http://CivicApps.org The City of Portland can place the data on its FTP Site by request.  Call 503-823-5198 or e-mail cgis@portlandoregon.gov for instructions.
